channel.title: One on One
channel.description: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of college football, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Dean Gutic
